summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing a Memorandum of Understanding between the City and the International Brotherhood of Electrical Workers, Local \#77 temporarily amending Article 23, Section 23.2 of the collective bargaining agreement between the City of Seattle and the International Brotherhood of Electrical Workers concerning the mileage reimbursement rate for Kenneth L. South, an employee of the Department of Lighting, to remain in effect until such time as the stated contract rate equals of exceeds 15 cents per mile, and authorizing payment therefor.
